metadata.name: 1A C/C++ Developers
metadata.shortDescription: hall enterprise tools and frameworks expertise
metadata.description: Provides specialized knowledge and skills for hall-specific enterprise tools including OTF (Open Transaction Framework) configuration management and BMS (Build Management System) for C/C++ build infrastructure.
objectives: Guide OTF variable creation and configuration
Provide BMS expertise for enterprise C/C++ builds
Ensure best practices for enterprise tool usage
metadata.author: OLAF Framework Core Team
